website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy stainless steel travel tumbler that is available in lots of great colors.
pros: Also works with the two included reusable straws
cons: A few buyers say it's not insulated as well as they had hoped

customer_reviews.title: Lid Doesn’t Stay On!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this cup, but I specifically ordered this for the lid and it doesn’t stay on. Slips right off making it useless. It’s never been in the dishwasher and only used for ice water. The cup looks great, but if you’re looking for a functional lid...this isn’t the cup for you.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Courtney

customer_reviews.title: insulated very well
customer_reviews.text: I really like the slender design as it fits into your hand well and doesn't feel top heavy like so many do in the 32 oz size. I took this on a drive to town in this Alabama Summer heat ,with the windows closed and left the car many times for many hours throughout the day. By days end a good 11 hours later the second photo shows about 1/3 of the ice remaining and my water was refrigerator cold all day . Our temps are currently in the high 90ties( feeling like 112 today's forcast ) so temps in the car get up to 130-172 within an hour - this cup is wonderful no doubt about it .
customer_reviews.author: Jillian P.

customer_reviews.title: Great brand!
customer_reviews.text: Update: When I got my order there was a code to order a free handle (as long as you pay the S&H). It goes perfectly with the tumbler. Wanted to get a new coffee mug that was insulated so my hot coffee stays hot and my iced coffee could stay cold in. I bought an insulated water bottle from the brand so I knew I could trust this one and I was right. Definitely a solid insulated tumbler that fits perfectly in my cup holder.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Calvo

customer_reviews.title: High capacity means fewer trips to the refrigerator for a refill.
customer_reviews.text: I have a rollator walker. A larger cruiser tumbler than my 22 oz. seems desirable. The 32 oz. tumbler appears to be well made and the 2 straws are acceptable. The blue color is consistent with my almamater, The University of Dayton, which is not in your list of colleges. I have just received it today, have washed it, and expect to enjoy it in the near future. I frankly hope that it not unstable for the rollator's add on cup holder. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: John Funk

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: You can see I love my Simple Modern cruiser tumbler. The 32 oz is on the right and the 22 oz on the left. (Straw purchased elsewhere). My husband and I have decided no more single use water bottles for us, we are going to help the environment. I have had my mug (22 oz) for a year and take it everywhere with me. It stays cold all day long. I haven't tried a hot beverage. I may buy myself another one, larger and pink! I have bought cheaper mugs and this is the only one I will use now. Stays cold a lot longer than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product!! It is so pretty the colors look like cotton candy!!! I’ve only had water it in but it keeps it very cold and they ice doesn’t melt for a while. I’ve taken to the beach and left in a hot car. Wonderful travel cup and I love that it fits in my cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Longley

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Lid but great body!
customer_reviews.text: When I tell you this cup keeps a drink cold overnight without a lid I'm sure you're shocked. But I bet you're also asking why I don't use the lid, well, I can't get it back on to save my life. This is my only tumbler, so the fact the lid doesn't fit after I've only hand washed the thing is slightly disturbing. I purchased the bright yellow tumbler, and to my surprise, it kept it's pretty yellow coat. The cup has amazing temperature retention but the fact the lid doesn't work is a big bummer, so those of you using it for travel might want to think twice. I'm very happy with my purchase despite the cups misgivings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other than the gasket, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love the cup and straw, hate the lid. The gasket wouldn't stay in place from the first day. If I wanted to drink by pouring water into my mouth, I would be giving 2 stars at most. However, I bought this as a larger replacement to the cup I have used for years and I really wanted to switch to using a straw, so it works for me. Still, it is annoying every time I put the lid on. Only way to keep the gasket from coming out it is to push perfectly straight down and hope. I am considering gluing it into place but dont own the right glue.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things cold... If you can get the lid on
customer_reviews.text: This tumbler is AMAZING at keeping things cold! I can put ice in the cup and it will still be there 18 hours later! However... I gave it 2 stars because the lid is absolutely ridiculous. I have two and BOTH have problems. The rubber portion of the lid comes off all the time and unless you sit it just right (it's ridiculous how many ways you have to adjust it) it won't go back on the cup/be impossible to remove from the cup. For having such a great tumbler you'd think they could spend a little more time making the lid more functional.
customer_reviews.author: Snicks8

customer_reviews.title: Great cup!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cup! It will keep a soda cold and bubly for literally hours! I had poured myself a soda late one night and before I could drink more than about 2sips I fell asleep. The next morning around 10:30 or so I reached to move the cup and was shocked to hear ice rattling inside it! Then I cautiously took a small sip and that thing was still carbonated! Not quite as good as when I'd poured it but definitely drinkable! I'd definitely recommend it! And I'd buy more of them! I just wish they'd had more colors when I'd ordered mine. I wanted something more girlie! Lol
customer_reviews.author: K Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Customer!!  Top-Notch Products!!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd purchase from Simply Modern. My teen daughter has two water bottles from them and raves about them so I decided to give this tumbler a try. The quality is top notch, and I get tons of compliments at work on the cute ombré color. This brand may be just a few dollars more than some of the other lesser-quality brands offered on Amazon, but I promise you will not be disappointed with SM products. Their products are comparable, or even better, than some of the well-known, most popular brands that you will pay twice as much for just to have a certain brand name on your cup.
customer_reviews.author: AlabamaFamily

customer_reviews.title: Best I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many insulated cups but none seemed to seal well. This one is fantastic! I love love love it. I bought another one. I have told my sisters about it. I've told my co-workers how much I love it. I used my first one for over 3 months and it seals just as well now as it did the first time I used it. I have also sat outside with my tumbler in the sun for several hours and it is still cold! I've left it in my car on sweltering hot days, and it stays cold. Forget Yeti's. This is way better!
customer_reviews.author: SmartOne

customer_reviews.title: Not so Nice Tumbler
customer_reviews.text: 06/13/2019 Updating my review. Not long after purchasing, the seal just fell off. It had only been washed once and used for just water. Tried to put the seal back on but it blocks from proper closure and gets messed up when you try to close it. I would expect this to happen over time but not so quickly. Very unhappy. Love it! Great size, sleek design, and very well insulated. Still plenty of ice even after sitting in my hot car for well over an hour. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and so good!!!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty, I ordered another for my mom!! I was a little worried about some of the reviews of the kid coming off. When I first put it together it seemed that I might have the same issue... With that said when I put my lid on a twisted it a bit and it was fine. I absolutely love love love my new cup!! This may be a new go to gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Kady

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tumbler 💗💙
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this tumbler! Love the colors too!!! It is perfection! The perfect size! Leak proof and very insulated!! I put iced tea in it before work and 8 hours later, the ice cubes were STILL in there!! I also PURCHASED the handle separately. Grrrrr.... wish I had waited because the tumbler came with a "free handle "coupon!!!! Funny thing is, I read that in someone elses review. Should've taken their word before purchasing. Ugh...... Either way... I LOVE EVERYTHING!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MIMI

customer_reviews.title: Great Tumbler!
customer_reviews.text: For those that are concerned about leaking have to remember this is a tumbler, not a water bottle, and they are usually not leak-proof. That said, there is zero leakage around the lid, just the mouth opening if not held or stored properly. But this product is well-made and I love the fact that they donate a portion of the profits to charity. It does retain my fingerprints and lip prints (from chapstick) but wipes off easily. Very easy to clean overall and keeps my liquids cold for hours. I really love the color choices too! 10/10 would buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING TUMBLER - KEEPS COLD, KEEPS HOT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tumbler! I use it all day long. Put a bunch of ice in the AM and your drink is STILL cold later in the day. No lie! I even left it in the car while I went to the beach, got back to the car and it was STILL cold. The instructions specifically call for leaving the lid off when using it for hot beverages. I haven't tried that yet since I like mine for water, but I'm willing to bet your hot drinks will stay piping hot! My daughter has one and loves her too.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Only good for cold drinks
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute cup. It cleans very well. I hate when a tumbler forever smells and tastes like coffee after not cleaning it out immediately. The stainless steel interior really protects against any lingering smells/flavors. HOWEVER: when I put a hot drink in it, unless I keep the mouth latch open, the steam forces the lid off of the cup. I only use it for cold drinks now.
customer_reviews.author: HJT

customer_reviews.title: Great insulated tumbler
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tumbler for a few months now. It is amazing at keeping my ice water icy cold. I've even left it in a hot car for an hour+ and come back to cold water! The outer coating is very durable and stays looking nice despite a little bit of abuse. I carry this thing with me everywhere. The rubber gasket inside the lid comes off for easy cleaning (it does sometimes slip around when closing the cup, but I just have to readjust it a little bit...small price to pay to keep mold and other germies from growing in the lid). Thinking about buying another in a different color just because I like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bremer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: My refrigerator is on strike and not producing ice. I purchased this tumbler so I could use crushed ice from my neighborhood convenience store and have a cold drink during work and/or after work. I purchased the Slim Cruiser for the attractive color. It seemed pricey, but, hey, I am worth it. I wanted to be sure my tumbler would not be confused with any of my co-workers' boring black or chrome items. In one day of use I recognized that the Slim Cruiser has extraordinary thermal performance as well as good looks. After 24 hours there was still some ice in the bottom of the glass. How cool is that?
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Bird

customer_reviews.title: 24 oz cup not 32 oz
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 32 oz cup. Not long after I noticed I was drinking a lot more water than normal not long after I got a 16 oz water to pour into the cup and a second one to top it off with. I wasn't drinking more water my 32 oz cup only holds 24 oz of fluid + - a oz. The one 16 oz bottle of water with the little ice in the cup left over. That was all the cup holds roughly 24 ozs. I'll be sending it back and using something that actually holds 32 ozs of fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck J.

customer_reviews.title: The Lid Needs to be Improved!
customer_reviews.text: Love the cup itself. The Taffy Ombré is very pretty. The cup is easy to hold from the bottom, but still too big for our cup holders in the door of the car because the top of the cup is wide (32oz). The HUGE problem is the lid does not seal properly. It is VERY difficult to get pressed in to close, therefore not sealing enough to ensure being leakproof— and also it’s very difficult to remove, despite not being correctly. It’s like the rubber seal twists/rolls as you maneuver the lid on or off. Because of the lid issue, my less expensive Amazon and Ozark cups work better at maintaining temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Katharina Gamboa

customer_reviews.title: Alittle disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to LOVE this cup. It keeps water, SO cold for hours...but, the lid/seal is not great. The black seal moves when I put the lid on and it slides up...doesn't close shut which makes it very difficult to take off...i have drop the cup and sullied water bc the seal is so tight...but not in a good way...i have tge 32 in and it probably only holds 24 oz...1 1/2 16oz bottles of water...a little disappointed 😞
customer_reviews.author: Judy M., Hackensack, NJ

customer_reviews.title: I recommend a smaller size
customer_reviews.text: I love the chic look of this travel mug and that it comes with a straw, however, I was not anticipating the size when I ordered it. I think I just saw the look of it and blacked out, completely ignoring that it said 32oz. I have small-ish hands and can barely hold this. When it is filled up its just safer to hold it with two hands. But I know for most people this is an ideal size. I haven't had any issues with leaks, though I don't love that the lid doesn't screw on. And it is easy to wash since its so big my hands fit inside easily. It is a really beautiful travel mug.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, sturdy, and does what it advertises!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a tumbler with a straw and that held more than 24oz. This tumbler is pretty, keeps my water COLD all day- (6:45-2:15 until I get a chance to refill). It also survives my clumsiness: I’ve dropped it with no dents, it’s fallen out of my lunch bag and rolled around the trunk of my SUV with no damage. (Which is a good thing because it arrived in a flimsy box with a mailing label slapped on the side. It could have been damaged in transit by general handling OR even falling out of the packaging.) I’m happy with my purchase. Now to hide it from my teenage daughters so they stop stealing it!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn T.

customer_reviews.title: All Good But Lid Retained Beverage Odors
customer_reviews.text: Loved my tumbler color, size (smallest one) and texture (body has a little texture to the painted part. One issue I encountered and did not expect was the lid’s retention of odors. My husband used my tumbler for a flavored coffee and even though he washed it well there was an overwhelming smell of the spices still left behind. My hot cocoa was not even drinkable due to the smell. I think that it dissipated over time with multiple washings, but I ended up having to buy a new one for myself that is just for hot chocolate so we don’t have the issue again.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Nevers

customer_reviews.title: This over my yeti
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 yetis I use to take to work to keep water in easy reach throughout the day but I would have to refill atleast 3x a day. I didn’t expect this to work as well as a yeti, but I was WRONG!!! This cup is amazing! I’m a hygienist so I put ice water into at 7:30, refill it with water at lunch and when I leave very little of my ice has been melted! The suction of the lid if the drinking spout thing is down is amazing! Make it a little hard to open but that’s great knowing that if it tops, nothing will come out. Almost want to buy more to replace my small yetis
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great mug!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and overall design of this cup. Holds 32 ounces (yes, I measured) so it’s easy to get in your water for the day. The ice doesn’t melt, keeps it nice and cold. It also fits perfectly in car cup holders! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie M.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps ice frozen for a week
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. This will keep ice not melting for over a week! (My husband experimented to check). Even keeps ice frozen for 2 days if you leave the lid off. It keeps coffee hot at least 16 hrs (the longest I’ve tried it). Lid fits snugly, no leakage, I let it roll around on the floor of car while full of liquid if my cup holders full and no leakage. My husband has even washed in dishwasher a few times and it’s OK still but I told him don’t wash in dishwasher - want it to last!
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: A pain to use!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking tumbler. Love the two tone. But the lid is so difficult to open! It is so hard to get the lid off to refill and I refill often. You also have to lift the black drinking tab up in order to replace the main lid. Otherwise there is too much pressure and it won't go down all the way. The black tab is also very difficult to open making this tumbler not very convenient to use. I can't use it. My daughter likes it so I guess I'll let her use it. Guess I'll go back to buying the cheap 10 dollar ones.
customer_reviews.author: J. Conche

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cup! I'm a huge fan of stainless steel cups so I know how easy they are to clean - if you haven't tried them before you're missing out! The color is amazing and didn't come off the outside yet (will update if it does), the lid goes on tight but not so tight I can't open it, the straw it comes with is convenient, the cup fits in your car cup holder, easy in the hand. I love it and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rubeo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold & Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This ombre cruiser is absolutely gorgeous. My 2 favorite colors, teal/purple, on one cup... Score! I can't tell the difference between this brand and Yeti except for price. I own several Yeti's and got to say, I love this one more because it's cheaper (not in quality) and I love the ombre colors. The slim design makes it so much easier to hold and to fit into the cars cup holder. Overall, EXTREMELY happy with this purchase. Buying more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S.

customer_reviews.title: Great travel mug. Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Love this travel mug. The 20oz is the perfect size for me. Keeps my coffee at a pleasantly warm temp for at least 2-3 hours. Recommendation is handwash only, so if you refuse to wash dishes this may not be for you. Reason I gave it a 4/5 instead of a perfect score is because sometimes right after I pour my coffee (black with a little heavy whipping cream, delicious) and I put the lid on and the mouth piece is closed pressure builds up and the lid will actually pop up. Probably due to the way it’s insulated, I don’t know. Overall a great travel mug...liked it enough to write a review, which I rarely do. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Yes, the lid DOES stay on! Great cup!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up giving this cup a shot because I love the rest of the Simple Modern lunar collection, but I almost didn't for the negative reviews about the lid not staying on. If you watch my video, you'll see that all you have to do is open the flip top before trying to put it on. If you don't open it first, you're basically pushing against the vaccum seal it creates and will never stay on. Common sense folks. This cup is great and the lid DOES STAY ON.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Best tumbler I ever owned !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love my tumbler !!!!! In fact I bought another one but a bigger size and color😊 They keep my drinks cold/hot for a very long time. Very durable, great quality, easy to clean and love the ombré colors which isn’t cheaply made, High quality and love the fact it has a little bit of texture to it for grip instead of a smooth surface(To ensure non slippage from your hands).
customer_reviews.author: Heather Renee Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Ohhh myyy gooodddnessss.
customer_reviews.text: When I say I’m shocked, I truly mean it. Everyone - LOOK NO FURTHER!!!!! these tumblers hold the water cold for so long you’ll begin to think there’s a built in refrigerator (I’m not kidding). I woke up, poured some water, added some ice and NO JOKE I woke up the next morning and STILL HAD ICE IN THE WATER. I didn’t even think twice to get another tumbler the next day for my mom. And let me tell you, she absolutely loves it too. Such a perfect use of money!!!! Don’t look any further. This product is honestly perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Yelena

customer_reviews.title: New Obsession
customer_reviews.text: A blogger I follow turned me on to this line. I have bought multiple sizes and prints for the whole family. I cannot say enough about the quality. I have several Yetis and prefer these because of their size and comfort when holding. My kids are obsessed too. We have turned many friends on to this great line. I love the 32oz because I drink a lot of water and don't have to refill every two minutes. The design allows it to fit easy in my car too.
customer_reviews.author: Mea J

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these cups, one has to go straight back because the cap was broken. The second one to cap didn't stay on correctly, the seal kept moving around cause it to pop off or be very hard to get back off. But the prism color cup... is absolutely perfect and beautiful.. I'm so confused. So I had to give it a three Don't think I'll buy these again. Sad because they were very pretty
customer_reviews.author: Family account

customer_reviews.title: Simple Modern.
customer_reviews.text: I Love this glass, ❤️❤️❤️❤️ it does exactly what the promo says it does. I really didn't expect what I got, when I first received it I filled it up and then turned it upside down for about 3minutes. No leaks! I have had it for a while now, and still jump when it overturns still no leaks! It fits perfectly in the cup holder. And just so you know ice will be in your glass if you leave it overnight on your night stand in the morning. I was amazed! Love it❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Annoying lid
customer_reviews.text: Design on the cup is nice, but overall not very functional. The rubber piece on the bottom of the lid slides off and/or gets twisted every time I take the lid off or put it back on the cup. This also makes it not close all of the way. I’ve only had it for 4 days but I don’t see myself using it for very long because of this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite! Just twist and pull when removing lid!
customer_reviews.text: This keeps my coffee very hot. Does not leak at all. I definately have opted to not put this gem in the dishwasher just to reduce the risk of damaging it. Easy to hand wash though. For all of you people that are crying about the lid gasket... Be gentle with it! I have learned to twist and pull up when removing it so it doesnt damage the gasket. You get what you pay for! For me, I love it and works perfect for daily use!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty colors!
customer_reviews.text: I only gave four stars because I bought it as a gift, so I can’t really say anything about it being leak proof, but it’s easy to hold and easy to clean. The ombre color on it is really pretty! Looks exactly like the picture and I really hope my friend enjoys it! Also, it said that I would be getting it around April 2nd and it got to my house 6 days early, so that was pretty awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great cup
customer_reviews.text: So I love the slim design of this cup and the matte finish as it doesn’t get cold to hold on the outside like a lot of tumbler cups. The color is beautiful and looks just like the picture. The only reason I did Not give this 5 stars is it is quite the workout to get the lid off to refill. Like I had to bring in reinforcements which was my 230 lb husband to try and help me. Does the cup leak? Absolutely not. Does that inner ring around the lid do it’s job? Absolutely. Is it impossible to open sometimes to refill, you bet ya. So that’s my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B.

customer_reviews.title: Really stays cold and holds a lot of water
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tumbler, especially given the price. It holds a lot of water, but still fits in the cup holder of the car, which is hard to find. It's also easier to carry than some this size because the bottom part isn't as wide. It's surprisingly leakproof if you close the lid, although I've been using it with the straws that it came with. Overall, I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kailey

customer_reviews.title: Yes and No
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold ice at all! But!!! I don’t need ice for 24 hours! It’s a pretty cup but it’s not Your typical double insulated cup that keeps your drink ice cold. I drink water all day, everyday and wish it was better for ice cold water, Texas heat requires it! But I do like the cup as a good fit in your hand. Better than the monster cups that I tend to drop often.
customer_reviews.author: Monica B.

customer_reviews.title: It's super
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these, including the one for our daughter in rose gold (sooo pretty) This time of year we like to make iced coffee. I have to tell you, the way these little gems keep our drinks so cold, with ice still there when we get home from work in the evening. My husband keeps his in his truck as he goes out to work, the outside temp has been 102-105, and in his closed cab, the beverage stays cold and ice sticks around. WONDERFUL.
customer_reviews.author: Ridin'High

customer_reviews.title: Great and keeps drink cold
customer_reviews.text: I love this tumbler. It was bigger than I was expecting it to be (I bought 30oz) but it’ll help me keep my water drinking quota. Fits perfectly in my cup holder in my car and keeps my water cold when I add some ice. Not sure how it works with keeping drinks warm but I’m sure it does the job. Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a simple modern fan. I have a few other bottles from them and I was looking for a tumbler for everyday use. First, it keeps my ice frozen for the entire day. Like I mean I filled my cup up at 8 am and my ice was still there by 9 pm. Can not say good enough things about this tumbler or the company. Definitely get this cup you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color, size, and style
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, size, and style of this! I have tons of different cups like this as I take 1 to work everyday for my soda and this one certainly stands out! My only complaint is that it doesn't keep ice frozen as long as some of my other cups but that won't stop me from using it or ordering more! I have access to ice all day so for my purpose, it's not a dealbreaker.
customer_reviews.author: N. Richter

customer_reviews.title: So helpful for pitiful water drinkers like myself
customer_reviews.text: Coming from someone who is HORRIBLE about drinking enough water, this is so so helpful. We live in the desert in 100+ degree heat and I didn’t understand why soooo many Marine spouses carried around water tumblers (also HydroFlasks but that made sense to me more). No way I get it, I drink so much more water when I use a straw and don’t really see how much water I’m drinking/have to drink. This has helped make it so much easier to stay hydrated and not feel like “ugh I need to drink more water.”
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Leewright

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing cup. I use it for smoothies to hide the color and it keeps my drink nice and cold. The top is simple and easy to clean. It also have a larger hole at the top for a wider straw. I want another on for water!
customer_reviews.author: Anne G. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Nice color choices, durable and comes with TWO reusable straws!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my water bottle. The color choices are great, it's easy to clean. It comes with 2 straws, it's been leak proof so far with the closed cover. The only downside is the weight and ability to hold easily. I purchased the 32oz with the purpose of simple math. Trying to consume 128 oz of water per day. Keeping tracking of filling 4x is easiest than a smaller bottle and losing track. I guess you can look at it as adding a little weight lifting into my I crossed intake of water.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Whisper

customer_reviews.title: Great insulated cup.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and love using this for cold beverages. Even with the plastic lid, it’s well insulated and ice water still has ice in it the next day. The shape of this water cup fits in my cars cup holder and still hold a lot of liquid. I mainly use the straw with this cup but appreciate that the lid is multi use.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Cool
customer_reviews.text: I am not a brand name snob and wasn’t about to spend $30 on a cup when SM have these super cute ones that work great at keeping things cold. I haven’t tried hot drinks yet just cause I love me some ice water, even in the winter. I hate the feeling of metal on my lips so thank you for including straws. The opening is even big enough to fit my large silicon straws so I am a happy girl! The slim size fits my cup holders and I haven’t had any issues with the lid popping off like others. In fact, I am so happy that I ordered a large water bottle for the summers in AZ.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Harris

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS, BUT.....
customer_reviews.text: Received the 32 oz slim cruiser. Perfect size and fits so well in the car. Easy to carry, easy to clean. Keeps cold drinks very cold for hours. Love the ombre colors. My only grip is the rubber gasket in the lid. Once that gets disturbed it is never been the same. It came off once when lifting the lid and now I have a difficult time getting it to line up and seal correctly. I love the cup so much I can overlook this issue. Ordered a 2nd as a back up
customer_reviews.author: E. R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup! Lid does seal well and snap part of the top does go all the way back so it’s easy to drink out of. Coupon inside from Simple Modern to order 4 free matching straws, just pay shipping. A bit big to hold but totally worth it to be able to take more beverage with me. Fits in the car cup holder and I loved all the color choices
customer_reviews.author: gotbluegrass

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Cruiser Tumpler lid falls off
customer_reviews.text: I love these products, we owned 4 but my daughter lost one so this was my excuse to buy a new (bigger) one. Unfortunately, the top of the Cruiser Tumbler doesn’t stay on AT ALL. The videos show it suctioned on but mine literally lifts right off. I’m hoping I can exchange it for a new one because I LOVE these bottles. (I also just bought 3 more 9oz ones for my kids lunch boxes.)
customer_reviews.author: KK714

customer_reviews.title: Great looking tumbler!
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving 4 stars now because the tumbler hasn't been used--I ordered it as a Christmas gift for my daughter. But it arrived on time and is very nice...I love the texture because fingerprints fade on it. Pretty cool. The colors are also very nice. Oh, and my tumbler came with 2 straws. I'll update to 5 stars if my daughter says it keeps her drinks cold for a long time as promised!
customer_reviews.author: SassyRunner

customer_reviews.title: Lid is difficult
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning this cup because the lid makes me CRAZY! Every time I put it on or take it off the black plastic ring, which is supposed to keep it waterproof, moves and makes it hard for me to get it on and off. I've poked myself in the face one too many times with the straw while trying to get the lid off and on. Aside from that, it's a great cup! I'm actually sad I have to send it back because I really do like the color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it ♡
customer_reviews.text: Looks so pretty!! Love to use it. But not the straws, if they could pair this product with stainless steel straws too that would be more perfect to buy. I saw other reviewers said the lid came off pretty soon, I think it is just the way we remove it. If you lift the straw hole before you try to open the lid, it will be an easy job without doing making any damages to the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great cup
customer_reviews.text: Love this cup! I got it since my man ruined my hospital cup that I loved dearly. This is pretty dang big and easy to carry (would be awesome if it had a handle though). I love that it comes with 2 straws and is easy to clean. It literally will keep my drinks cold and the ice stays in there for HOURS! I will definitely be investing in some different colored ones.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: After opening, the lid was suctioned closed so it was really hard to open at first. I immediately put water in it and closed the lid to test it upside down... It spat water at me... I turned it upside down for a few seconds and there was no leak. I bought a Coolata at Dunkin Donuts and poured it into the cup before I went to work. The drink was sour so I neglected to drink it the entire 8 hours. When my shift was over, the coolata barely melted. I tried coffee the next day and it stayed warm almost my entire shift. I am impressed with this cup!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Keep your drinks cold for a long time with no sweating
customer_reviews.text: In an age where everything is dishwasher safe, that would be the only downfall. I'm not bothered by it though with this cup because of how much I love it! It keeps drinks cold and we're thrilled that it keeps ice overnight. No sweating cups with the humidity. I have bought four of these so we can each have one. I also feel that having a straw in your drink increases how much we drink. They're wonderful cups and the color choices make it easy to distinguish who it belongs to!
customer_reviews.author: jonebraska

customer_reviews.title: Super cold/hot drinks for long periods of time!
customer_reviews.text: This tumbler is wonderful! Not only is it a beautiful color (Prism), it's exactly as advertised with a few extra benefits. The coolest thing is that I had a drink with ice in it, 24 hours later the ice was still solid! Also, I am on the go a lot and wanted my cold enegry drink but didnt have a fridge to store it in. Even in the hot car, for several hours, I was still able to have my ice cold drink! I HIGHLY recommend this tumbler.
customer_reviews.author: madharmony

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle. Keeps my water cold nicely and fits in the cup holders in my van. My only complaint is there was a slight dent in the side when i received it. The dent did not affect the color though so it isn't very noticeable. I get compliments on the fun color!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Linsenmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Color faded with initial cleaning with hot water.
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in the straw and color. I ran hot water to clean it before first use. I brought into work the next day and product had faded in spots. This was the dark purple/blue color. Nice design not to big fits great in cup holder. Just disappointed in quality of outside material.
customer_reviews.author: None to show

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLANT PRODUCT ... EXCELLANT CUSTOMER SERVICE!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying my 32oz ... had a small problem in the beginning, but Customer Service the best! I use it for iced tea at work, and my tea is always cold. And should I tip it over, there's no leak (made sure of that at home!) Should I ever need another 32oz or another size, I'll purchase from this company.
customer_reviews.author: ManD

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than two months
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in mid-December - for school use, no less, so it wasn't even used for two of the past 8 weeks...and the inside of the lid has already come apart! The actual Thermos brand that we bought several months prior for our other child is still going strong so stick with the name brand ("Thermos") products.
customer_reviews.author: Studio Manager

customer_reviews.title: The seal on the top cover won't last more than a few weeks. Otherwise, great cup!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup! Keeps my water cold all day long. Fits in my cupholder perfectly. I've used it over the last 2 weeks and the seal around the plastic top keeps popping off... and now won't stay put (stretched) causing it not to seal and leak when tipped. Two weeks of use and I only had water in it.
customer_reviews.author: whoknew

customer_reviews.title: 32 ounce tumbler
customer_reviews.text: I really like the tumbler as it keeps my drink cold/cool for many hours. That being said, I am a bit disappointed about the rubber ring on the lid as it has way too much play in it and continues to come off each time I remove the top of the tumbler. I don't want to return it but I sure would like another ring for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ford Carrigan

customer_reviews.title: Very cute style, Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The lid stays on very well, I like that it includes two straws. I will say, it does not keep ice as long as our yetti's but for the use I need it is great. I purchased to encourage myself to drink more water, and this helps keep me on track. The color options are very attractive as well.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: The perfect cup
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe I went so long without this cup in my life. I have literally had it fall from my passenger seat to the floor without it spilling. It doesn't sweat and it keeps my drink cold all day. Plus it fits in my cup holder. All in all - I think I finally found the perfect cup.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Great Cups
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2, one for me and daughter. Drove out to ND to visit friends in high 90s weather and kept our drinks cold. Ice even in the mornings after setting in car over night. Fit nicely in cup holders. They are a bit heavy, but well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mug! Works really well! Only thing I found is that at first the suction is extremely strong and will cause the lid to try to pop off. I found if you open the mouth piece area when putting the lid on and then close the mouth piece area, it prevents that from happening! I have gotten lots of compliments on this travel mug!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Mattsen

customer_reviews.title: Works...
customer_reviews.text: Never had this type of what I call a party cup. 32oz of fun! The cup delivered what it was supposed to do. I was impressed that it did keep my drink cold. Even left a cup out over night and by morning it still had ice in it! So now I get to use less ice and more drink which is great...Party On!
customer_reviews.author: amazonsteve1234

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Best $ ever spent on a cup
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant due to the cost, but now that I’ve had it for 6 months, it’s the best money I’ve ever spent for a cup. I can fill it with some ice and water before bed, and the following night before bed it is still cold!!!! I’ve also tried coffee in it, and it keeps it scalding hot for hours, I actually had to take the lid off for it to cool enough to drink it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom A.

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold!
customer_reviews.text: Best cup I ever bought. Keeps my ice water cold for an entire day. I take it to the pool on hot days and my ice doesn’t melt.
customer_reviews.author: KAccurso

customer_reviews.title: best tumbler!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for my self and my 2 kids. Tired if all of the plastic straw cups in the cabinet that everyone uses once and doesn't wash. threw out all of the plastic ones and we each now have one of these. I bought some extra reusable straws to go along with them along with a brush for the straws. The cup keeps the liquid ice cold for 12-20 hours depending in how much ice you put in.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Nack

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love my 32 ounce tumbler for water! The blush color is so pretty and girly. It’s great for on-the-go so I pretty much take it everywhere to ensure I’m sipping water constantly. It’s super easy to wash and it keeps my water chilled all day. The only issue I have with this product is with the inner seal on the lid. One side rolls out of place sometimes but it’s easy enough to push it back. If not for that, this would literally be the perfect tumbler! I plan to purchase other products from this brand. These would make a great gift as well!
customer_reviews.author: apriloak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cold drinks!
customer_reviews.text: This large tumbler is perfect. I’m disabled, so it’s a struggle to fill ice trays as well as getting refills for whatever I’m drinking. With this 30oz tumbler, the ice last longer and saves me so much time messing with ice.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Coy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: LOVEEEEE this mug I’ve only had it for two days but I tested it to see how well it would hold freezing cold water and hot water . And it passes the test for both it keeps both liquids as expected for 5hours. And plus The only thing is I think I got a defective lid because my lid leaks and it’s hard to close I spend a goood 5 mins trying to close the cup but other then that it’s good
customer_reviews.author: jasseline h

customer_reviews.title: Leaks, bad seal
customer_reviews.text: Great looking mug but nearly useless as a travel mug or leak - resistant mug. The rubber seal that goes around the bottom of the lid refuses to stay in place (too tight) and displaces itself EVERY TIME you insert or remove the lid leaving a big gap in the seal. Now have to only use as a supersized water glass around the house. EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTING, especially considering the cost! Not recommended. The one I bought off the shelf at Walmart is much better at less than half the price.
customer_reviews.author: RANDALL

customer_reviews.title: Lids are NOT good
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup, it fits in cup holders, but my issue is the lid. It does not hold up and will get stuck where you can't get it off and the ring that is to secure it ALWAYS falls off, so it makes this cup super annoying
customer_reviews.author: J. Blair

customer_reviews.title: My second Simple Modern purchase, and will purchase more!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 24 oz water bottle that I love; I've had it for almost 2 years and it's wonderful. I recently got an Amazon gift card for my birthday and decided to use it to buy a tumbler to keep my non-water drinks cold. It's great for seltzer and soda because it keeps ice from melting and watering down your drink. I love that it came with two straws!! I will be buying two more for my son's preschool teachers as Christmas gifts. Highly recommend this brand!
customer_reviews.author: CC1108

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors and very easy to hold and carry.
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can pick my own design. It’s lighter than my expensive knock off and much easier for my small hands to pick up and carry. I only gave it 4 stars because it doesn’t keep the liquid as cold as other cups like this. I bought the four of us each one and it’s helping us drink more water and saving on dirty cups.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa V

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!  Great colors.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cup. Just what I wanted. Colors are vibrant. The lid is tight but easy to remove. Fits auto cupholder perfectly. Fits in hand nicely. I prefer this to my Yeti. I use it in Phoenix Az for iced tea and keeps ice in cup the entire day. Plan to purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Plante

customer_reviews.title: Rubber seal on lid is crappy at best
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I'm going to sound like a jack wagon for complaining about this, but I really don't like this cup. I've had it for awhile now and I can't stand the lid of this thing. The rubber seal flips and doesn't stay put at all that it makes putting the lid on a damn chore. Idk if I'm just stupid but I've never had issues with a seal before on any of the RTIC cups or even Walmart's Ozark Trail cups. The design options are fun and I love the sleekness of these cups, but the lid is a nightmare and it pretty much causes me to flip a lid every time I go to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany C

customer_reviews.title: New Cup
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth beverage cup I've purchased - kept looking for one that fit in my SUV cup holder, could use a straw, keeps my iced beverages cold and is easy to keep clean. This cup does all that. Looks great, works better than promised. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila B

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: The cups color wasn't as vibrant as i was expecting and i dislike the black straw. Wish it was more of a translucent color so you can see if anything is stuck inside that needs cleaning. Otherwise great quality keeps drinks cold for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Grey

customer_reviews.title: We really like this travel cup!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, nice weight, comfortable to hold. It's a gift for my daughter and she loves it. It comes with an extra straw too!! I was concerned that the box wasn't tapped, so it could have been tampered with, but it was in new condition and it arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Renie

customer_reviews.title: Cold drinks for hours
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite tumbler. Ten times better than yeti. Ice stays frozen for hours!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ludington

customer_reviews.title: 3rd SIMPLE MODERN tumbler and probably not my last
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Simple Modern tumbler. Now I have one for home, one for school and my daughter took this one. The color is bright and beautiful. I love that each cup comes with straws. I have a slight addiction to ice. I need lots of ice! The ice doesn’t melt overnight or all day. Love the price and the quality is superb. New fan for life.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Reads 31

customer_reviews.title: Simple Modern does what it promises. And looks good while doing it!
customer_reviews.text: I love how cold Simple Modern keeps my water! I have a water bottle by them as well as the 30 oz travel mug in Havana (see photo). The paint is beautiful, the cup has a nice texture that makes it easy to grip, and if you don't use the straw, it is not easy to spill out of (thank goodness!) So far, after a week at work, it's PERFECT. The price is excellent for the quality. Hands down, I will buy more of these as gifts or if I need another drinking vessel.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite tumbler
customer_reviews.text: Omg this is my new favorite drink tumbler!! Just the looks alone, wooza lol! So pretty I dare say, the kid has great leak protection and it comes with 2 straws. Tempted to buy all the colors!! Definitely worth recommending!
customer_reviews.author: Christa Albert

customer_reviews.title: Great! Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I was hesitant to spend the money on these but my husband loves them. Says he would spend the $40 for two again any day. They work well, hold hot and cold water for hours and don’t leak. The quality of the outside is very good as well. I don’t see these chipping or peeling anytime soon. Well done product!
customer_reviews.author: Edwin & Pantea

customer_reviews.title: I'm OBSESSED!
customer_reviews.text: I love these tumblers. I now own 4 or 5 of them. They keep my cold drinks very cold. I had ice in my cup and it lasted over night. It also keeps my hot stuff hot. I like that we can close the opening of the top and that I don't have to worry about liquids spilling outside of the lid, because the lid is pretty much vacuum sealed onto the cup. The designs are really nice and have held up for me...even in the dishwasher (even though they said they're not dishwasher safe). I don't have any complaints about the cups. I will keep buying them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: A_Lamar

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I got the slim 32 oz in pink and aqua and its gorgeous, I got compliments on it all day on the lake. Which is great but its fully functional as well. I made a drink at noon and went on the boat on a 90 degree day. I finished my drink in the first hour or 2 and set my cup in a cupholder in the hot sun. When i came off the lake at 630, i had to dump the ice out. I'll be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good product, affordable, and keeps drinks a long lasting cold.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this brands products. They are affordable, cute, and keeps drinks cold for a long time. I would put ice cubes in early in the morning and they would still be whole and the drink would be cold 8 hours later. They are as good as the more expensive brands out there. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Norris

customer_reviews.title: Seriously love this cup
customer_reviews.text: The last cup you'll ever need. I've dropped mine several times and the lid never comes off, the outside never dents. It keeps ice for 16 hours. I occasionally drink iced tea from it with no metallic flavor. Even bought a couple for my equally klutzy kids. Theyre as pretty as you hope they are, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Lohr

customer_reviews.title: Great Tumbler with awesome personalized designs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tumbler as replacement to my 30oz tumbler and I am very picky because I've had some not so good ones from good brands. This tumbler has been thought out very well. It is well made, feels very robust and liquids stay hot or cold for a long time. I showed to my son and I am sure I will by more of these. never going back to the bubba
customer_reviews.author: Jairo R. Rodriguez

product_meta.title: Simple Modern 22oz Slim Cruiser Tumbler with Straw & Closing Lid Travel Mug - Gift Double Wall Vacuum Insulated - 18/8 Stainless Steel Water Bottle Ombre: Bermuda Deep
feature_bullets: Vacuum Insulated: Simple Modern Cruisers are double walled and vacuum insulated, which keeps your favorite beverage hot or cold for hours
Flip Lid with 2 Straws - a press in flip lid closes to create a splash proof seal and 2 BPA free, reusable, plastic straws
18/8 Stainless Steel: Tumbler is made from premium gauge 18/8 stainless steel
Fits Most Cup Holders: All Cruiser and Slim Cruiser tumblers will fit normal sized automobile cup holders

Why Simple Modern: Our core principles of Generosity and Excellence have inspired us to sell high quality products, act as great partners with everyone we interact with, and give away a minimum of 10% of our profits

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars5,518 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
